DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating The Efficacy Of Varenicline In Cessation Of Oral Smokeless Tobacco Use
DOC.criteria: Male female daily smokeless tobacco user age 18 year old , motivate stop use tobacco product . Subjects must daily user nicotine contain smokeless tobacco use smokeless tobacco least 8 occasion per day average week . Have use smokeless tobacco least 1 year prior screening period abstinence > 3 month past year . Subjects use nicotine containing product ( include smoke tobacco ) smokeless tobacco 3 month prior screen . Subjects exhale Carbon Monoxide ( CO ) > 10 ppm baseline . Subjects use varenicline , bupropion , NRT within 3 month screen . Subjects currently within past 12 month require treatment depression current prior history panic disorder , psychosis , bipolar disorder serious mental illness .
